id us-core-condition-code

url : http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/SearchParameter/us-core-condition-code

experimental False

useContext :

code : code

base :Condition

type : token

expression : Condition.code

xpath : f:Condition/f:code

xpathUsage : normal

mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)

mulitpleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)

name: USCoreConditionCode
description:
